twoFactorPreference.heading: Two Step Verification

step1.heading: Step 1 - Download Authenticator
step1.downloadAppInstruction: Before beginning, you will need to download an Authenticator to your phone or tablet. We recommend Google Authenticator or Microsoft Authenticator. You can find these in Google Play or in the App Store.
step1.completeInstruction: Once you have done this, click Continue.

step2.heading: Step 2 - Configure Authenticator
step2.openApp: Open the previously installed Authenticator on your device.
step2.clickAddAppButton: Click the Add Application button. This may be displayed with a plus (+) or some other symbol, depending on the Authenticator you have installed.
step2.scanQRCode: Select the Scan QR Code option and scan the following QR Code:
step2.successfulScan: On successful scanning, the Authenticator will generate a 6-digit code every 30 seconds.
step2.clickContinue: Click Continue to enter the code received.

step3.heading: Step 3 - Verify Configuration
step3.enterCode: Please enter the code from your Authenticator to finish the setup process:

iManage.manifestTooltip: For Inprotech iManage integration to work, Inprotech needs to be registered as an application in iManage, typically done in its iManage Control Center.  The app manifest package here can facilitate the registration process in iManage. Ensure the values here and in iManage Control Center are in sync with each other. Refer to your iManage Administration guide for details.
